name: 节奏快打/Rhythm Fighter
description:
▶Innovative"Rhythm+Action" Gameplay

You'll need to follow the music and move on the beat to sprint and punch, battling all kinds of powerful monsters.
In "Rhythm Fighter", you'll have a super cool battle experience.


▶Rogue-like Elements

Randomly generated level maps, interesting special rooms, hundreds of skills and equipment, free combinations... You can have new experiences every time.
DJs, agents, students... Lots of fantastic heroes with different skills, creating a variety of gameplay.
